content: the pattern is available in **german** and **english** the pattern is now also available in ** portuguese 3 ** **dutch** and ** italian 5 ** thanks to anfromdenmark 6 there is now a **danish** version of the pattern available thanks to jelican 8 there ist now a **swedish** version of the pattern available claire 10 has written the lace edging pattern in **charts** you can find them on here project page 11 thank you for sharing 3 http //www tricoteiras com/ p=1579 5 https //docs google com/fileview id=0b7nwi1mkvnk1zgmxyzc3nzgtzmyxni00mgu3lwe2ntgtowi4zdiyzmmyzjzm&hl=it&authkey=cicwybui 6 http //www ravelry com/people/anfromdenmark 7 http //www spinningmartha de/webroot/store11/shops/61920259/mediagallery/pimpelliese dk pdf 8 jelican 9 http //www spinningmartha de/webroot/store11/shops/61920259/mediagallery/pimpelliese_se pdf 10 http //www ravelry com/people/laralorelei 11 http //www ravelry com/projects/laralorelei/pimpelliese
